extendedInfo.description: Really smart bowling game! Top 3D graphics, realistic physics and double player option! Nice lane themes and many ball colors. The ball motion, rotation and controlling is amazing. If you love bowling, you would love this addictive game. Put your name in world ranking! How To Play smart bowling: 1. Drag the ball to left or right to position it. 2. Put finger on the ball and flip to the pins to throw.3. Gesture curve on the screen to rotate the ball. The speed and angle of flipping determine the motion of the ball. Play it. Love it!10-PIN BOWLING GAME RULES: A game is divided into 10 frames, each frame has 10 pins. The player is given 2 opportunities to knock down all 10 pins in a frame. STRIKE - a strike is awarded when all ten pins are knocked down with the first ball. The player is awarded ten points, plus a bonus of whatever is scored with the next 'two' balls.SPARE - a spare" is awarded when a player uses both balls of a frame to clear all 10 pins. The player is awarded ten points, plus a bonus of whatever is scored with the next ball.A player can score maximum of 300 points. See Wikipedia for more details.We welcome your rating and comments.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: Blessing Sibanyoni

reviews.comment: Yes

reviews.title: Vetteman
reviews.comment: Ok. If a pin is tilting past 60 degrees, it is going down. Do NOT re-set it! That is cheating. You get what you pay for (free version).
reviews.author: Patrick Gleaton

reviews.title: Not that great
reviews.comment: The advertisments at the bottom suck and the game acts weird. All the pins fall sometimes and it puts some back up. The locked levels and balls suck also.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste ur time!
reviews.comment: Very poor graphics (compared to others available) and don\'t like the ads at the bottom. Guess I\'ll pay the money to get a good program.
reviews.author: Thomas Rodgers

reviews.title: SUCKS
reviews.comment: Should be called magic bowl because knocked down pins magically STAND BACK UP. GET REAL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To many adds
reviews.comment: There is a false message on the bottom of the screen. It a pain when you are trying to play the game. I don\'t recommend this game to anyone. IT STINKS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: I hate it when i figure out stuff and not enjoy it so what im hearing is this game SUCKS? Going to try it but 4.0 bull.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok but a few glitches
reviews.comment: Ok, anoying that sometimes the last pins tofall over then are then standing back  for the second bowl, as overs have stated it can cost u strikes and spares, like the ball and lane choice
reviews.author: Glenn Wilson

reviews.title: sucks
reviews.comment: 3 strikes and each time only gave me 6 pins. also will not hook when you swipe.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bought game related set of balls but unable to use! Disappointed!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but glitchy
reviews.comment: This game is simple, and plain which isn\'t bad considering its bowling However tho it seems very elementary it seems to have some major glitches. The biggest one being that pins that are clearly on their way down just maybe slower than other pins stand back up (usually being the difference between a strike or a spare) this is a highly inconvenient issue seeing as how I believe I have gotten the sure fire way to get a strike every time also levels don\'t unlock after perfect game LAME!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible!
reviews.comment: As others have already stated, game play on this app is simply horrible.  Pins that CLEARLY went down, and which logically COULD NOT have stayed up, are placed back up by the game.  The opening screen is also very difficult to view because of the bright blue swirled background that makes it hard to see buttons and balls.  Then there\'s the ads...  While others MIGHT appreciate Japanese language ads featuring half naked anime characters, I didn\'t.  I will be reporting this to Google as I feel the content rating of this app needs adjusting if that sort of ad is going to be shown.  Oh, and don\'t bother selecting what ball you want.  No matter which you pick the game will give you something else.
reviews.author: Bernhard Behling

reviews.comment: You knock all the pins down and it puts them back up sorry excuse for a bowling game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: What can I say other than I love this game. I play it and play it and play it all day all evening all night.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A PIECE OF $H1T
reviews.comment: This game cheats u out of points that you deserved because it resets way too quickly!   You have to purchase the game in order to get different lanes and balls and its not worth it even as a free app.  I suggest you find another bowling game and not waste your time with this dumb behind game.  UNINSTALLED!!!!
reviews.author: Ninna Hatake

reviews.title: Game is mint
reviews.comment: I really like this game I always play on in some spare time is awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Only bad thing is if the pins are slow at falling they will be put back up. Gotten strikes several times and the ones that fall slowly it will put them back up and not count the strike! !
